flavorText: Wherever Yanggu goes, Mowu follows—sometimes at his side, sometimes obscuring him from view entirely.

foreignData.flavorText: Wo Yanggu ist, ist Mowu nicht weit — manchmal ist er an Yanggus Seite, und manchmal sieht man vor lauter Mowu Yanggu nicht mehr.
foreignData.name: Mowu, treuer Begleiter
foreignData.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden, Wachsamkeit
Falls eine oder mehrere +1/+1-Marken auf Mowu, treuer Begleiter, gelegt würden, werden stattdessen so viele plus eine +1/+1-Marken auf ihn gelegt.

foreignData.flavorText: Allá donde va Yanggu, le sigue Mowu: a veces a su lado, a veces ocultándolo por completo.
foreignData.name: Mowu, compañero leal
foreignData.text:
Arrolla, vigilancia.
Si fueran a ponerse uno o más contadores +1/+1 sobre Mowu, compañero leal, en vez de eso, se pone esa misma cantidad de contadores +1/+1 más uno sobre él.

foreignData.flavorText: Où que Yanggu aille, Mowu l'accompagne : parfois à ses côtés, parfois en le dissimulant complètement.

foreignData.text:
Piétinement, vigilance
Si au moins un marqueur +1/+1 devait être mis sur Mowu, compagnon loyal, autant de marqueurs +1/+1 plus un sont mis sur lui à la place.

foreignData.flavorText: Ovunque vada Yanggu, Mowu lo segue, a volte al suo fianco, a volte oscurandolo completamente alla vista.
foreignData.name: Mowu, Compagno Fedele
foreignData.text:

Se uno o più segnalini +1/+1 stanno per essere messi su Mowu, Compagno Fedele, mettine invece uno in più.

name: Mowu, Loyal Companion
originalText:
Trample, vigilance
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on Mowu, Loyal Companion, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

rulings.text: Because Mowu’s replacement effect affects only Mowu, it will apply if Mowu somehow enters the battlefield with one or more +1/+1 counters on it and give Mowu an additional +1/+1 counter.

text:
Vigilance, trample
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on Mowu, Loyal Companion, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.
